productIdType.x-fqm-value-getter: (SELECT array_agg(identifier_type.value->>'productIdType' ORDER BY identifier_type.value->>'productIdType') FROM jsonb_array_elements(:src__acquisition__orders_storage__titles.jsonb->'productIds') AS identifier_type)
productIdType.x-fqm-filter-value-getter: (SELECT array_agg(identifier_type.value->>'productIdType' ORDER BY identifier_type.value->>'productIdType') FROM jsonb_array_elements(:src__acquisition__orders_storage__titles.jsonb->'productIds') AS identifier_type)

qualifier.description: Information about the binding, format, volume numbers, part of a set, publisher, distributor, etc. which might be enclosed in parenthesis
